TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IPHostEntry extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 Internet 主机地址信息提供容器类。

span.span: Provides a container class for Internet host address information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将域名系统 (DNS) 主机名与一组别名和匹配的 IP 地址的数组关联。The class associates a Domain Name System (DNS) host name with an array of aliases and an array of matching IP addresses. 类用作类的帮助器类 。The class is used as a helper class with the class. ## Examples 下面的示例在 DNS 数据库中查询主机信息 `www.contoso.com` ，并返回实例中的信息 。The following example queries the DNS database for information on the host `www.contoso.com` and returns the information in an instance. [!code-cpp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与主机关联的 IP 地址列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of IP addresses that are associated with a host.

value.span: 一个 类型的数组，包含解析为 属性中包含的主机名的 IP 地址。

span.span: An array of type that contains IP addresses that resolve to the host names that are contained in the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性来访问与关联的 IP 地址 。The following example uses the property to access the IP addresses that are associated with the . summary.span: 获取或设置主机的 DNS 名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the DNS name of the host.

value.span: 包含服务器的主要主机名的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the primary host name for the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含服务器的主主机名。The property contains the primary host name for a server. 如果服务器的 DNS 条目定义了其他别名，则它们将在属性中可用 。If the DNS entry for the server defines additional aliases, they will be available in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性检索主主机名。The following example uses the property to retrieve the primary host name. [!code-cpp[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/CPP/iphostentry_addresslist.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/CS/iphostentry_addresslist.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/VB/iphostentry_addresslist.vb#1)]
